data.message: Facebook, I do not like "New: Recent notifications you may not have seen yet. These notifications are listed by how relevant we think they are to you, so they may appear to be out of order."  Please don't think you know what's relevant to me.  Go back to showing them in order.  Thank you.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you do not like the update to notifications, Barbara. In the future, you can let us know what we can improve on by sharing your feedback here: http://bit.ly/2zVGOdg. -Elizabeth
Facebook She is right. It's infuriating that you make these capricious and ridiculous changes. You have NO IDEA what's relevant to me.

Not only are they NOT relevant, but your "new" way of showing them makes no sense. I have "new" and had a reply to my comment 29 minutes ago there at the top,then 6 comments on DIFFERENT posts were in the "earlier" and they were NEWER than the 29 minutes ago reply. It makes NO sense, and is making me miss comments etc. Why do you implement things that make no sense and not even ask us or let us choose to keep our old settings? Stop it.
I don't understand why facebook interface is not friendly at all.
I also hate the way comments are displayed now.  It's the exact same way all out of order even when you hit the recent comments options.

Facebook Hello, an someone from Facebook staff contact me very important, My close friend's account has been Disabled for no reason, Facebook has asked her for ID and she did upload one, however Facebook inbox help center keeps on giving her the message ( In Process ) and nothing has happened yet! this message "Thank You
Unfortunately, you won't be able to access your account while we're reviewing these additional documents. We appreciate your patience, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can." Keeps on poping whenever she tries to log in! She cannot access the Help Center nor Inbox community! She needs help, She has provided Facebook with her Government ID card, with her name, Date of Birth and Location ( Jordan ) ! But Facebook is refusing her account and she is locked out! What can we do to help her out! She just needs someone from Facebook to contact her on her email. Eva.alsunna@gmail.com - She had her account since 2007 and this is not fair ! She is so frustrated and she wishes that someone from Facebook ( NOT A ROBOT ) to contact her!
Yup, totally agree, the latest change with the newsfeed/pages feed and the notifications SUCK
